attributes.action: Follow the lead of the Australian government and ban the tungsten filament light bulb
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For a considerable amount of time we have had available cheap long life high efficiency alternative light bulbs.
Lighting is a major user of electricity and changing from tungsten to flourescent bulbs is the single easiest way an individual can make an impact on carbon reduction. If all householders did it the impact would be huge. If all shops and commercial premises did the impact would echo around the world and citizens of the UK could all hold their heads high.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
